ImprovementInfo.Civilopedia: Four units may train in the castle increasing their residual xp gain from 4% to 10%!
Eight units may train in the citadel increasing their residual xp gain from 4% to 10%!
Two units may train in the fort increasing their residual xp gain from 4% to 10%!
A single unit may train in the ancient tower increasing their residual xp gain from 4% to 10% or 15% for mages!
